Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.board

Class Cloud

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.board.Cloud
public class Cloud extends Object
Cloud Class, it's one of GameBoard elements, here you can find the refill for the SchoolBoard's entrance.
Author:
Matteo Negro

  • Constructor Details

    • Cloud

      public Cloud(int idCloud)
      Cloud Constructor, students is initialized to zero for each color.
      Parameters:
      idCloud - it's a number in the interval [0;2] or [0;3], it's used to identified the cloud.

    • Cloud

      public Cloud(int idCloud, Map<HouseColor,Integer> status)
      Cloud Constructor, students is initialized to the saved state.
      Parameters:
      idCloud - It's a number in the interval [0;2] or [0;3], it's used to identified the cloud.
      status - It's a map that contains the number of student, for each house color, in the last saved status.

      The method refills the data structure where students are saved.
      Parameters:
      newStudents - The students to have to put on the cloud.
